snippet: Sheriff's officials in Utah have released the name of the snowmobiler who died after he was buried by an avalanche....

headline.print_headline: Sheriff Names Snowmobiler Killed in Utah Avalanche
headline.main: Sheriff Names Snowmobiler Killed in Utah Avalanche

lead_paragraph: Sheriff's officials in Utah have released the name of the snowmobiler who died after he was buried by an avalanche.
